comment: Market Rewind for Dec , . hammered again today as the bloodbath continues with week lows on many of the big players $ ACB $ OGI $ HEXO $ TLRY $ CWEB . Not expecting anything exciting from $ APHA and $ OGI when they release their losses next week ! !

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hammer-02
            :ARG1 (m2 / market
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Market"
                        :op2 "Rewind")
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :month 12))
            :mod (a / again)
            :time (t / today)
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / continue-01
                        :ARG1 (l / low-04
                              :ARG1 (p / person
                                    :quant (m3 / many)
                                    :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                                          :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                                :ARG0-of (p3 / play-01)
                                                :mod (b / big)
                                                :example (a2 / and
                                                      :op1 (c3 / company
                                                            :name (n2 / name
                                                                  :op1 "ACB"))
                                                      :op2 (c4 / company
                                                            :name (n3 / name
                                                                  :op1 "OGI"))
                                                      :op3 (c5 / company
                                                            :name (n4 / name
                                                                  :op1 "HEXO"))
                                                      :op4 (c6 / company
                                                            :name (n5 / name
                                                                  :op1 "TLRY"))
                                                      :op5 (c7 / company
                                                            :name (n6 / name
                                                                  :op1 "CWEB"))))))
                              :time (w / week
                                    :mod (w2 / week))))))
      :snt2 (e / expect-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a3 / anything
                  :ARG0-of (e2 / excite-01))
            :time (r / release-01
                  :ARG0 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (c8 / company
                              :name (n7 / name
                                    :op1 "APHA"))
                        :op2 (c9 / company
                              :name (n8 / name
                                    :op1 "OGI")))
                  :ARG1 (l2 / lose-02
                        :ARG0 a4
                        :time (w3 / week
                              :mod (n9 / next))))))

comment: Missles fired . I truly hope we do not go to war . all higher after Iran fires dozens of missiles at US army bases in Iraq . No casualties reported . Troops were given enough warning before the strike . Trump will give a statment tomorrow morning on the matter . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Missles fired . I truly hope we do not go to war . all higher after Iran fires dozens of missiles at US army bases in Iraq . No casualties reported . Troops were given enough warning before the strike . Trump will give a statment tomorrow morning on the matter . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / fire-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / missile))
      :snt2 (h / hope-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (g / go-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG4 (w2 / war-01))
            :ARG1-of (t / true-01)
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (f2 / fire-01
                        :ARG0 (c / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Iran"))
                        :ARG1 (m3 / missile
                              :quant (m4 / multiple
                                    :op1 12))
                        :location (b / base
                              :mod (a2 / army
                                    :mod (c2 / country
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "US")))
                              :location (c3 / country
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Iraq"))))))
      :snt3 (r / report-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (c4 / casualty))
      :snt4 (g2 / give-01
            :ARG1 (w3 / warn-01
                  :ARG2 (t2 / troop)
                  :ARG1-of (h2 / have-quant-91
                        :ARG3 (e / enough)))
            :ARG2 t2
            :time (b2 / before
                  :op1 (s / strike-01)))
      :snt5 (s2 / state-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Trump"))
            :ARG1 (m5 / matter)
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (m6 / morning)
                  :mod (t3 / tomorrow))))
